idea:
Trapigo was founded in 2017 by a group of IIM, IIT, NIFT, and NID alumni, targeting to solve last mile logistics problem in a complex geography like India's.
Trapigo is a last mile 'Business to Business'â€‹ logistics service provider for food products and other critical amenities such as medicines, travel, kits, handicrafts etc. Trapigo is unique as it has specialised the technology to deliver articles to the travelling customers (moving on trains) apart from the usual static ones. We plan to cater all the key tier 1 and tier 2 cities in India and expand our services to locations of strategic importance to our customers.
We provide a highly automated app-based services with the real-time order status, location tracking features and a live performance dashboard. We partner with vendors to add value in terms of business development and analytics.
name: CHIKAZO TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
